text: @d_rafi1 I didn’t realise that #socialdistancing rules didn’t apply if you’re clapping. Is “going out to clap” now on the the list of “reasonable excuses” to leave your home? #COVID19 #ClapForOurCarers

entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.
